fields.name: - Unflipped:
fields.value: Give a player a nice and yummy bottle of wine. They get a little **Tipsy** and have a 25% chance of not taking their turn for the next 3 turns.

fields.name: - Flipped ( <:pink:1106716301843497030> + <:black:1106265022453268530> + <:purple:1106247148607131711> ):
fields.value: Give a player a nice and yummy bottle of Everclear. They get stupid drunk and are **Tipsy** for 4 turns, having a 25% chance to not take a turn per turn **Tipsy**.
